Description: Get your trip off to a great start with a stay at this property, which offers free Wi-Fi in all rooms. Strategically situated in Vancouver Downtown, allowing you access and proximity to local attractions and sights. Be sure to set some time aside to visit Stanley Park as well as Kitsilano Beach nearby. Rated with 4.5 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to restaurant, hot tub and fitness center on-site.
